description: Non-material amendments to appeal decision APP/N5090/W/21/3289161 dated 12/07/22 (planning ref 21/3726/FUL) for 'Redevelopment of the site to deliver up to 260 homes and up to 709 sqm GIA of Class E commercial floorspace through the conversion of Barnet House from offices to residential, including extension at roof level, and the front, rear and side elevations alongside the provision of Class E use at ground floor of Barnet House. And the demolition of rear annex and erection of new residential buildings. Together with associated public realm, landscaping, access improvements, car and cycle parking.' Amendments to include: New connecting corridor for fire safety; Replan some apartments to facilitate new corridor; 'Twinning' of some balconies to facilitate new corridor; Replan apartment layouts on top two floors to enable dual means of escape; Replan apartment above substation on noise considerations; Inclusion of local vents and risers in accordance with revised fire strategy; Reconfiguration of landscaping to retain more trees; Rationalisation of basement to improve efficiency of car parking layout; Improved car parking arrangement increasing the car parking ratio from 0.22 to 0.25.
